#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,m,i,j,k,a[1000],carry,no;
    
    cin >> test;
    for(m=0;m<test;m++)
    {
      cin >> no;
      if(no == 0 || no ==1)
      {
            cout << 1 << endl;
            continue;
      }
      for(i=1;i<1000;i++)
         a[i]=-1;
    
      a[0]=1;  
    
      for(j=2;j<=no;j++)
      { 
         i=0;
         a[i]=j*a[i];
         for( ;(a[i]>=10) || (a[i+1]!=-1);i++)
         { 
            carry=0;
            if(a[i]>=10)
            {
               if(a[i+1]==-1)
                 a[i+1]=0;
              carry=a[i]/10;
              a[i]=a[i]%10;
            }
            a[i+1]=(j*a[i+1])+carry;
         }
       }
       for(k=i;k>=0;k--)
         cout << a[k];                
       cout << endl;  
    }
       
    return 0;
}
